# Corporate Photographer NYC

Contact us

## NEW YORK CITY’S PREMIER CORPORATE PHOTOGRAPHERS FOR FORTUNE 500 COMPANIES

For over 30 years, Camera 1 has been providing industry-leading companies in
New York City with world-class photography. Our key services include executive
portraits, personnel headshots, creative photography for branding, original
website photography,  and event photography. In addition to our years of
experience, we have an extensive list of clients ranging including Fortune 500
companies, law offices, financial firms, bankers, pharmaceutical companies and
more. Our client list serves as a testament to the quality and reliability of
our work. Camera 1’s talented corporate photographer NYC team offers expert
technical and creative skills in shooting photography for both print work and
digital media.

## MEET PATRICK NUGENT, CORPORATE PHOTOGRAPHER NYC

Patrick is a professional photographer and the owner  of Camera 1.  With over
15 years of experience as a corporate photographer, Patrick is trusted by
CEO’s, Fortune 500’s, and industry-leading companies to produce photos that
make their people look their best. Camera 1’s state of the art photography
studio in Midtown NYC is fully equipped with top of the line cameras, lenses,
and lighting. Whether you would like a corporate photographer to come to your
office for an on-site photo shoot, or to bring your team into our studio for
executive portraits, Camera 1 has the talent, experience, and tools to produce
the high-quality photos you’re company needs.

## ABOUT OUR CORPORATE PHOTOGRAPHY STUDIO LOCATION IN NEW YORK CITY

Located conveniently in Times Square, our large, open NYC headshot studio
makes it easy to get in, get out, and get back to work. We offer a full range
of creative digital services that include on-site review and editing of
images, retouching and creative consulting in-studio or on-location.
